author: duftler
msg: Removed the Base64 class that was temporarily added when we went back to
Xerces 1_0_3.

author: duftler
msg: Removed some extraneous import lines relating to the move of
org.apache.soap.util.DOMUtils to org.apache.soap.util.xml.DOMUtils.

author: duftler
msg: All Element.getAttributeNS(...) calls have been changed to use
DOMUtils.getAttributeNS(...).

author: duftler
msg: Added getAttributeNS(...) to DOMUtils. It has similar behavior to
DOMUtils.getAttribute(...). This is to be compliant with the DOM-
specified behavior of Element.getAttributeNS(...) returning ""
when an attribute does not have a specified or default value.
DOMUtils.getAttributeNS(...) will return null if there is no
specified or default attribute value.
printNamespaceDecl(...) will now use DOMUtils.getAttributeNS(...).
Move DOMUtils from org.apache.soap.util.DOMUtils to
org.apache.soap.util.xml.DOMUtils.

author: duftler
msg: Copied the Xerces util code for Base64 into our source tree (temporarily).
Xerces v1.1.2 has a bug that causes Element.getAttributeNS(...) to return
an empty string when the attribute is not specified; it should return null.
I also fixed 2 bugs regarding the registration and behavior of the
Base64Serializer. It was not being registered correctly, and the
marshall(...) method was printing the object reference toString() instead
if the String representation of the array of bytes.
